text: Aspergillus subalbidus is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. It is from the Candidi section. The species was first described in 2014. ==Growth and morphology== A. subalbidus has been cultivated on both Czapek yeast extract agar (CYA) plates and Malt Extract Agar Oxoid® (MEAOX) plates. The growth morphology of the colonies can be seen in the pictures below. Aspergillus_subalbidus_cya.png|Aspergillus subalbidus growing on CYA plate Aspergillus_subalbidus_meaox.png|Aspergillus subalbidus growing on MEAOX plate ==References== subalbidus Category:Fungi described in 2014
title: Aspergillus subalbidus
